Constructor Detail

EmpiricalPiecewiseConstant

public EmpiricalPiecewiseConstant(double[] intervals,
                                  double[] popSizes,
                                  double lag,
                                  Units.Type units)
Creates a piecewise constant model with the given break points.

Parameters:
intervals - an array of intervals, Each interval represents time over which a different population size is assumed, the first interval starts from the present and proceeds back into the past.
popSizes - the effective population sizes of each interval. The last population size represents the time from the end of the last interval out to infinity.
lag - a lag to align the break points with the most recent sample time (must be positive)
